00009 LatexLoader::LatexLoader(QObject *parent)
00010                 : QObject(parent) {

00024 void
00025 LatexLoader::parseData(const QString &data) {
00026     // write the xml to the temporary file
00027     QString filepath = tempdir.absoluteFilePath("temp");
00028         QFile f(filepath);
00029     f.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00030         QTextStream str(&f);
00031         str << data;
00032         f.close();
00033 
00034         img = QImage();
00035     delete latex;
00036     latex = new QProcess(this);
00037     connect(latex, SIGNAL(finished(int)), this, SLOT(processExited()));
00038     QStringList args;
00039     args.push_back(filepath);
00040     imgname = filepath+".png";
00041     latex->start(cmd, args);

00047 bool
00048 LatexLoader::isEmptyRow(const QImage &img, int row, QRgb c) const {
00049         bool empty = true;
00050         for (int i=x; empty && i<w; ++i) {
00051                 empty &= img.pixel(i, row) == c;
00052         }
00053         return empty;
00054 }
00055 bool
00056 LatexLoader::isEmptyCol(const QImage &img, int col, QRgb c) const {
00057         bool empty = true;
00058         for (int i=y; empty && i<h; ++i) {
00059                 empty &= img.pixel(col, i) == c;
00060         }
00061         return empty;
00062 }
00063 void
00064 LatexLoader::getBackgroundColor(const QImage &img) {
00065         // obtain colors of four corners
00066         QRgb tl = img.pixel(0,0);
00067         QRgb bl = img.pixel(0,h-1);
00068         QRgb tr = img.pixel(w-1, 0);
00069         QRgb br = img.pixel(w-1, h-1);
00070         if (tl == bl && isEmptyCol(img, 0, tl)) {
00071                 bg = tl;
00072         } else if (tl == tr && isEmptyRow(img, 0, tl)) {
00073                 bg = tl;
00074         } else if (bl == br && isEmptyRow(img, h-1, bl)) {
00075                 bg = bl;
00076         } else {
00077                 bg = tr;
00078         }
00079         bgr = qRed(bg);
00080         bgg = qGreen(bg);
00081         bgb = qBlue(bg);
00082 }
00083 void
00084 LatexLoader::cropImage(QImage &img) {
00085         x = 0;
00086         y = 0;
00087         w = img.width();
00088         h = img.height();
00089         getBackgroundColor(img);
00090         bool empty = true;
00091         for (; empty && x<w;) {
00092                 empty &= isEmptyCol(img, x, bg);
00093                 if (empty) ++x;
00094         }
00095         empty = true;
00096         for (; empty && w-x>0;) {
00097                 empty &= isEmptyCol(img, w-1, bg);
00098                 if (empty) --w;
00099         }
00100         empty = true;
00101         for (; empty && y<h;) {
00102                 empty &= isEmptyRow(img, y, bg);
00103                 if (empty) ++y;
00104         }
00105         empty = true;
00106         for (; empty && h-y>0;) {
00107                 empty &= isEmptyRow(img, h-1, bg);
00108                 if (empty) --h;
00109         }
00110         w -= x;
00111         h -= y;
00112         img = img.copy(x, y, w, h);
00113 }
00114 float
00115 LatexLoader::getMinAlpha(float c, float b) const {
00116         float a = 1;
00117         if (b == c) {
00118                 a = 0;
00119         } else if (b != 0 && b > c) {
00120                 a = 1-c/b;
00121         } else if (b != 255 && c > b) {
00122                 a = (c-b)/(255-b);
00123         }
00124         return a;
00125 }
00126 int
00127 LatexLoader::getOrigColor(float a, float c, float b) const {
00128         if (a > 0 && a < 1) {
00129                 c = (c-b)/a + b;
00130         }
00131         return int(c+0.5);
00132 }
00133 QRgb
00134 LatexLoader::addTransparency(QRgb &c) const {
00135         int r = qRed(c);
00136         int g = qGreen(c);
00137         int b = qBlue(c);
00138         float ra = getMinAlpha(r, bgr);
00139         float ga = getMinAlpha(g, bgg);
00140         float ba = getMinAlpha(b, bgb);
00141         float a = (ra > ga) ?ra :ga;
00142         a = (a > ba) ?a :ba;
00143         r = getOrigColor(a, r, bgr);
00144         g = getOrigColor(a, g, bgg);
00145         b = getOrigColor(a, b, bgb);
00146         return qRgba(r, g, b, int(a*255+0.5));
00147 }
00148 void
00149 LatexLoader::addTransparency(QImage &img) const {
00150     if (img.isNull()) return;
00151     img = img.convertToFormat(QImage::Format_ARGB32);
00152     QRgb p;
00153         for (int i=0; i<w; ++i) {
00154                 for (int j=0; j<h; ++j) {
00155             p = img.pixel(i,j);
00156             p = addTransparency(p);
00157                         img.setPixel(i, j, p);
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 }
00161 QImage
00162 LatexLoader::cleanse(const QImage &i) {
00163         QImage j = i;
00164         cropImage(j);
00165         addTransparency(j);
00166         return j;
00167 }
00168 void
00169 LatexLoader::processExited() {
00170         if (latex->exitCode() == 0) {
00171         if (img.load(imgname)) {
00172             cropImage(img);
00173             addTransparency(img);
00174             emit readImage(QPixmap::fromImage(img));
00175         }
00176         }
00177         QFile(imgname).remove();
00178 }
